attributes.name: Year
attributes.description: The year in which the cycle occurs.

attributes.name: Quarter
attributes.description: The specific quarter of the year. Possible values might include 'Q1', 'Q2', 'Q3', and 'Q4'.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: The current status of the cycle, such as 'Planning', 'Active', 'Reviewing', 'Completed'.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Detailed description of the key result

attributes.name: Progress
attributes.description: Percent completion of the key result

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Status of the key result such as 'Pending', 'On Track', 'At Risk', 'Completed'

attributes.name: Objective
attributes.description: Reference to the objective this key result is part of.

attributes.name: Title
attributes.description: The title or main idea of the objective.

attributes.name: Owner
attributes.description: Reference to the user in charge of the objective.

attributes.name: Cycle
attributes.description: Reference to the cycle this objective belongs to.
